sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - அடங்கு, தலை, கவிழ், ஒடுங்கு, குனி, தணி, தாழ்
to bow, to crouch, to bow down, to be bowed down
1) to be bowed down, to be prostrated, to be humbled
4) to crouch (used of a wild animal in its lair)
b) (Niphal) to be prostrated, to be humbled, to be reduced, to be weakened, to proceed humbly, to be bowed down
c) (Hiphil) to prostrate, to lay low, to bow down
d) (Hithpolel) to be cast down, to be despairing
Cognate: H3439, H7807, H7817
